mapper.insert: insert into user_tbl(user_id, user_mobilephone, user_status, user_create_date, user_update_date, user_device_type, user_device_id) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userMobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, now(), now(), #{userDeviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDeviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
